content: We are though introducing a new data plus offering, which has even more benefit to our customers and is based on some of their feedback and the features and value that they've been asking for, including increased retention rate, including higher query limit some of our customers who sent us petabytes of telemetry and want to be able to in real time clarity that significant date ranges and across multiple engineers, need additional query performance capacity and we can allow that with the data Plus offering, as well as new data sets and new capabilities that we're bringing to the platform will be on top of the Data Plus offering.
